ca.uqac.lif.textidote.rules

Class CheckFigurePaths

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.Rule
      • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.rules.CheckFigurePaths

  • public class CheckFigurePaths
extends Rule
    Checks that included figures are not referenced by an absolute local path.

    For the means of this rule, an absolute path is anything of the form

    • X:... (Windows drive letter)
    • /... (Unix absolute path)
    • anything that contains .. (moving up in the folder structure is not recommended)
    Formally, this rule checks that no such path appears in an \includegraphics command.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©
